channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: It’s bullshit like this that makes me wonder how so many Americans could be so STUPID.
item.source:markdown: It’s bullshit like this that makes me wonder how so many Americans could be so STUPID.

item.description: Alito's neighbor interviewed on CNN. Very brave and clear-thinking. We should be organizing for what's to come.

item.description: 2018: Comey made announcement on Clinton email probe days before election to give himself cover.

item.description: When ChatGPT can read my blog. This is what I've wanted since long before ChatGPT existed. I can't imagine what the privacy concerns are. Everything on my blog is by definition public.
